title: High ping only in league
body: Anyone else having higher ping than normal? Internet is fine, 40 ping, all my other games have normal ping. I usually have around 40-50 ping in league but the last 2 days it is at a constant 120. Tried repairing, did every step in the connection help page, restarted internet and everything else i could think of. Its just league.

replies.body: There could be a couple factors here causing this, most likely how your network is routing to the game server.  Are you on wifi? I know you mention going over the guide but to double check did you run through [Configuring your DNS](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)?  That can update how you are routing to the server.
